title: Jeremy Loffredo, Author at Unlimited Hangout
cleaned_text: While his COVID-19 policies have dominated media coverage regarding his disappearance and suspicious death, Tanzania’s John Magufuli was hated by the Western elites for much more than his rebuke of lockdowns and mask mandates. In particular, his efforts towards nationalizing the country’s mineral wealth threatened to deprive the West of control over resources deemed essential to the new green economy.

opengraph.title: Jeremy Loffredo, Author at Unlimited Hangout
